body_html: @SsnL Looking at the docs again I think it might be possible after all. While NFS (or at least the version described in those docs) doesn't support mandatory locking, it does support advisory locking. The latter may be enough to perform range locks. Let's use this issue to figure it out. I think it's a great usability enhancement.

body: @SsnL Looking at the docs again I think it might be possible after all. While NFS (or at least the version described in those docs) doesn't support **mandatory** locking, it does support **advisory** locking. The latter may be enough to perform range locks. Let's use this issue to figure it out. I think it's a great usability enhancement.
